        public void getAllImages(android.app.Activity activity,
                         android.widget.GridView gridView)
        Get all images from server One interesting observation: you must pass the gridView from the mainActivity. If you inflate the view in the callback, it would fail.
        Parameters:
        activity -
        gridView -
